m_szDocSumamry: Sooner than you think? A prediction that electric cars will cause the next oil crisis via Paleofuture/ Arthur Radebaugh In the fifties and early sixties there was a wonderful newspaper series, Closer Than We Think, drawn by Arthur Radebaugh. In 1958 he predicted that we would soon be driving solar powered electric cars. Now Bloomberg Business is starting a video series called Sooner Than You Think that well might be more accurate.
